review: I bought this Apple TV so that I could watch Chinese tv series from iPad apple apps on the big TV.  Works great.  I even ordered one for my sister and brother-in-law.  The only issue is the picture on the big TV gets a little pixelated when it's enlarged from 9" to 46".
author: M. Harper

review: I received this as a gift and at first thought didn't think I would use it much. On opening the box and setting it up (very easy to set up) this became my primary way of watching shows. I have an older tv that doesn't have netflix or other apps built in. However, t ended up getting rid of my cable because I am able to watch hulu and netflix, and use the Airplay to stream any other shows I have. I think considered getting a Roku as they are reputable as well. However, with me having an iPhone, iPad and MacBook Pro, it's a no brainer of having the Apple TV to work seamlessly with all other Apple products. It excels extremely well at this. Being able to mirror whatever on my iPhone or iPad is one of the best features of the Apple TV. Definitely a great product, very satisfied customer!
author: Anson

review: I haven't met an apple product I didn't like. This is a seamless product. The only thing to note is that if you want to connect it to your surround sound is that you need and optical cable and input on your stereo or an adapter. Doesn't cost a whole lot to get that set up. But worth mentioning
author: Brian & Kim French "French Family"

review: I hadn't been able to get one of these to work in hotels before, but now that I have a hotspot through my 4G LTE phone (with unlimited data), I can use this just like I do at home.  Great to have the options to watch Netflix, MLB.TV, HBO-Go, ESPN WatchNow, etc. when I'm away from home.
